definition[0]: a large sea fish with several rows of very sharp teeth that is considered to be dangerous to humans
note[0]: shark-infested waters (=waters where there are a lot of sharks)
example[0]: Sharks were circling around our boat.
definition[1]: someone who cheats other people out of money
note[1]: pool/card shark (=someone who uses their skill at pool or cards to cheat other players out of money)
definition[2]: someone who cheats other people out of money, especially by giving bad financial advice
example[1]: Never do business with these sharks.
